cards.name: Fantasticar
cards.ability: Activate: Give your End of Turn cards +2 Power.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E.
cards.ability: Each turn this is in play, swap to a <mark>new Activate ability</mark> until one is used.

cards.name: Mister Fantastic First Steps
cards.ability: End of Turn: Give a card in your hand -1 Cost or +2 Power.

cards.name: Silk
cards.ability: After ANY card is played here, move this to another location.

cards.name: Spider-Ham
cards.ability: Activate: Replace the text of a random character in your opponent’s hand with “oink!”

items.title: Golden Gauntlet II
items: The event will be open to the public and will have 1,200 players. Visit Discord for more info.

items.title: High Voltage: Overdrive
items: Play to earn Volts to earn rewards and unlock new cards - Kid Omega and Cobra!

items.title: Collector's Vault
items: Exclusive variants available again for a limited time!

items.title: Sanctum Showdown
items: Your favorite mind-bending location dominating limited time game mode returns!

items.name: Infinity Ultron
changes: 5/8 - On Reveal: Add 2 of Ultron’s Stones to your hand.

items.name: Infinity Power Stone
changes: 3/2 - On Reveal: Double Infinity Ultron’s Power.

items.name: Infinity Reality Stone
changes: 3/1 - On Reveal: Add a Drone here. Set its Power to Infinity Ultron’s.

items.name: Infinity Time Stone
changes: 3/1 - On Reveal: Put a card from your hand here.

items.name: Infinity Space Stone
changes: 3/4 - On Reveal: Move the lowest-Power enemy card here to the location of Infinity Ultron.

items.name: Infinity Soul Stone
changes: 3/3 - On Reveal: For each of your full locations, give one of your cards there +2 Power.

items.name: Infinity Mind Stone
changes: 3/2 - Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

items.name: Giganto
changes: 6/14 - You can only play this at the left location.

items.name: Omega Red
changes: 4/5 - Ongoing: If you’re winning here, +3 Power to other locations.

items.name: Supergiant
changes: 4/5 - On Reveal: All cards played next turn don’t reveal until the game ends.

items.name: Spider-Ham
changes: 1/1 – On Reveal: Transform the leftmost card in your opponent’s hand into a Pig, keeping its Power and Cost.
1/2 – Activate: Replace the text of a random character in your opponent’s hand with “oink!”

items.name: Silk (Text Update)
changes: 2/5 – After ANY card is played here, this moves to another location..
2/5 – After ANY card is played here, move this to another location.
